author: Mark Kaufman
title: You can't kill the coronavirus. That's OK.
description: Some viruses look like moon landers. Called phages, they hijack bacteria by landing on the hapless cells and injecting them with a ream of genetic material. Then, the phages use the commandeered cells to multiply. Similar to the new coronavirus, these phages …
content:
Some viruses look like moon landers.
Called phages, they hijack bacteria by landing on the hapless cells and injecting them with a ream of genetic material. Then, the phages use the commandeered cells to multiply.
Similar to the new coronavirus, these phage… [+5569 chars]
